metadata.synopsis: A goblin guard reacts to a caged heretic being freed by calling on allies to attack the player and the heretic

0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Zami
0.text: Oi! Heretics belong in cages or in pieces. Kill 'em, lads!
0.context: NodeContext: noticing that players havefreed a caged heretic - everything before 'Kill 'em, lads!' is shouted at players who may be a few feet away. 'Kill 'em, lads!' is a call for backup to any nearby goblins
